resources.string: This app will display your name, place of study and the validity of the digital student card. This app will display a photo of you if you choose to select one. This app will function as a student card and can be used as identification at services which companies has an agreement with you place of study. First time usage requires you to be connected to WiFi or a cellular connection to download the information required to display the student card. This information will be stored locally in the app. KortFri do not take any responsibility for tickets, abuse or any usage that violates Norwegian or international laws. The photos uploaded with this app will be deleted from our database once you as a user is deleted from our systems. Users with admin-rights to the KortFri system has the possibility to delete users. Usually this will be the IT-responsible on your place of study.
At first use the app must be connected to the Internet to download the information. This is stored locally and does not need to be online to use the app later.
E-CardHolder assumes no responsibility for any fines, abuse, etc.
You have already picked a photo
You are admin, use the web app

You have to type in a code to change profile picture. Your teacher or system administrator gives you this code. IMPORTANT INFORMATION: You can only use this code once! After using the code only the system administrator can alter your profile picture. This is done because the app is used as identification. Remember that using the identity of another person can be illegal. (for example: Use your friends app to get a lower priced buss ticket.)
STOP! If you are not pleased with the way the picture look, go back and change it.
